page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: { {Dumfries and Galloway College of {Technology}is located in modern buidings on an extensive site 2.5 miles north of{Dumfries}town centre. The college is supplied with students from the {Dumfries and Galloway}and the surrounding regions e.g. Stranraer, Castle Douglas, Newton Stewart, Dalbeattie and Upper Nithsdale. To enable those who live a distance from{Heathhall}to make use of these facilities, an 80 bedroom hall of residence is available. The College offers a variety of different courses e.g. Full_time courses that last for 2_3 years, Part_time courses that last for a few weeks to almost a year, and night classes of various lengths.
